welcome.title: Ložiska
welcome.subtitle: Václav Haruda
welcome.headline: Welcome to our website!
welcome.introduction: We company offers a wide range of bearings, V-belts, Shaft Seals, O-rings, Seeger Circlips, Copper Crash Washers, Grease nipples and other bearings accessories. Our company offers you the high-quality goods and services in the field. We are focused on continual improvement our provided services and increasing range of our goods. That’s evident in increasing numbers of our satisfied customers. Feel free to visit us in our branch or contact us via email or phone.
